Author: tea-addicted-taemint
Text: Afaik, the only inpatient facilities here in NZ are in Auckland and Christchurch, though outpatient treatment occurs at many hospitals. If you are a minor, I think they also do some AN treatment at Ronald McDonald house.  As a top of the south person I work with my GP and a dietician at my city's hospital. Definitely speak to your doctor to at least get a diagnosis and work on a treatment plan from there.
